de.dimensionv.java.libraries.common.exceptions

Class InvalidValueException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • de.dimensionv.java.libraries.common.exceptions.InvalidValueException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InvalidDoubleValueException, InvalidEnumValueException, InvalidFloatValueException, InvalidIntegerValueException, InvalidStringValueException

    public class InvalidValueException
extends RuntimeException
    Generic runtime exception class for indication that a provided value was invalid. Please see the specific Invalid<Type>ValueException classes for more specific exceptions.
    Since:
    API 1.3.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Volkmar Seifert <vs@DimensionV.de>
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InvalidValueException(Object value)
      Constructor that accepts the invalid value.
      InvalidValueException(Object value, Throwable throwable)
      This constructors takes the invalid value plus a possible throwable that should be wrapped by this exception.
